page.title: 19THE SPAR SHOP,WARBOYS
page.content: We sell many things in our shop, groceries,frozen foods,tinned foods,hardware,fresh vegetables etc.. We have two tills,ones electric and the other one is a push one .We sell cigarettes and alcoholic drinks.We have a meat counter and five freezers. My Dad cooks his own meat. My dad goes to cash and carry once a week ; we have a fruit van once a week.We have more than one place to store our goods when they are not in the shop. We can store them in the shed and we also have a wine store and a beer store,we put our coal in the garden,we have two freezers in the wine store for frozen foods.In our shop you get a trolley or a basket and get what you want and pay at the end. We have a phone in our office and the office overlooks the garden.My dad goes to Spar meetings 4 times a year.
